testcase.classname: Verifying the Adactin Search Hotel Details
testcase.name: Verifying the Search hotel with Invalid Check-IN and Check-OUT Dates

testcase.name: Verifying the Select Hotel Without any Fields

testcase.classname: Verifying the Adactin Book Hotel Details
testcase.name: Verifying the Book Hotel with Entering Valid Details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Adactin Page...........................................passed When User Should Perform Login "Akilan1008" and "Iphone@11promax"...........passed Then User Should Verify After Login Success Message "Hello Akilan1008!".....passed And User should Search the Hotel Details "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Double","2 - Two","21/01/2023","22/01/2023","2 - Two" and "1 - One".passed Then User should verify After Search Hotel Get the Success Message "Select Hotel".passed And User Should perform select hotel........................................passed Then User Should Verify After Select Hotel Success Message "Book A Hotel"...passed And User Should Book the Hotel "Akilan","Arumugam" and "Chennai"............passed Then User Should Verify After Book the Hotel Get Success Message "Booking Confirmation" and Save the Generated OrderId.passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the Adactin Book Hotel Details
testcase.name: Verifying the Book Hotel without Entering any Fields
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Adactin Page...........................................passed When User Should Perform Login "Akilan1008" and "Iphone@11promax"...........passed Then User Should Verify After Login Success Message "Hello Akilan1008!".....passed And User should Search the Hotel Details "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Double","2 - Two","14/12/2022","15/12/2022","2 - Two" and "1 - One".passed Then User should verify After Search Hotel Get the Success Message "Select Hotel".passed And User Should perform select hotel........................................passed Then User Should Verify After Select Hotel Success Message "Book A Hotel"...passed And User Should Select the Book Now button without Entering any Fields......passed Then User Should Verify Error Message "Please Enter your First Name","Please Enter you Last Name","Please Enter your Address","Please Enter your 16 Digit Credit Card Number","Please Select your Credit Card Type","Please Select your Credit Card Expiry Month" and "Please Enter your Credit Card CVV Number".passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the Adactin Hotel Cancel Order ID
testcase.name: Verifying to Cancel the Generated Order Id
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Adactin Page...........................................passed When User Should Perform Login "Akilan1008" and "Iphone@11promax"...........passed Then User Should Verify After Login Success Message "Hello Akilan1008!".....passed And User should Search the Hotel Details "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Double","2 - Two","14/12/2022","15/12/2022","2 - Two" and "1 - One".passed Then User should verify After Search Hotel Get the Success Message "Select Hotel".passed And User Should perform select hotel........................................passed Then User Should Verify After Select Hotel Success Message "Book A Hotel"...passed And User Should Book the Hotel "Akilan","Arumugam" and "Chennai"............passed Then User Should Verify After Book the Hotel Get Success Message "Booking Confirmation" and Save the Generated OrderId.passed And User Should Cancel the Generated Order Id...............................passed Then User Should Verify After Cancel Order Id Get success Message "The booking has been cancelled.".passed
